amendment.description: Amendment sought to require that if a U.S. company or its subsidiary labels its product as containing GMOs in any foreign country, that company must also label the equivalent product the same way in the U.S.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 123 - 303 (Roll no. 459).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. DeFazio.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 123 - 303 (Roll no. 459).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
